titlestmt.titleproper: Moss Roberts Vietnam War Research Files TAM.403
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Tamiment staff

publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2015-05-06T15:51-0400

change.item: Edited by Heather Mulliner to reflect updated administrative information

did.unittitle: Moss Roberts Vietnam War Research Files

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

did.abstract: Moss Roberts (1937-) is a professor of East Asian Studies at New York University. The collection contains his research files on the Vietnam War.

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Moss Roberts (1937-) is a professor of East Asian Studies at New York University.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Moss Roberts sent a donation of his research files on the Vietnam War in 2007. The accession number associated with this gift is 2007.005.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Moss Roberts Vietnam War Research Files; TAM 403; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright (and related rights to publicity and privacy) to materials in this collection created by Moss Roberts are held by Moss Roberts. Permission to publish or reproduce materials to which s/he holds copyright must be secured from the copyright holder. Please contact the Tamiment Library for assistance with contacting Moss Roberts.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The collection contains his research files on the Vietnam War.
